# Help and Support

# Slack

If you have a question or would like some community support we recommend you join us on Slackopen in new window.

Note that this is the Slack community for Landoopen in new window but we are more than happy to help with this module as well!

# GitHub

If you'd like to report a bug or submit a feature request then please use the issue queueopen in new window in this repo.

# Contact

If you need priority and dedicated support, expediated bug fixes or more features then please contact us below:
